ygData.subject: RE: Songs and resists
ygData.msgSnippet: ... (This is hearsay) A lot of paladins complain about this one.  Some high level disease and poison DoTs require cancel magic to dispel them. Cure
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 8 Dec 1999, Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 wrote:
>
> Can you explain what you mean here? The way I interpret it is that it
> doesn't matter if you sing Elemental or Purifying Rhythm in regards to
> resisting a disease/poison DOT because those spells check your magic resist
> rate (which will be the same for both songs). How were you able to
> determine that poison/disease DOTs don't check your poison/disease resist
> rate? If they don't check your poison/disease resist rate, would that be
> considered a bug or a "feature"? This is also the first time I have ever

(This is hearsay)

A lot of paladins complain about this one. Some high level
disease and poison DoTs require cancel magic to dispel them.
Cure poison/disease will not work on them, even though you'd
think it would. I would assume they do check your
disease/poison resist.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
